text: Manuel Charlton (25 July 1941 â€“ 5 July 2022) was a Scottish hard rock guitarist. He was the founding member of the Scottish hard rock band Nazareth and was their lead guitarist from 1968 to 1990. Charlton died on 5 July 2022 at the age of 80.Founding Nazareth Guitarist Manny Charlton Dead At 80Nazareth Founding Guitarist, Manny Charlton, Dies ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Manny Charlton website * * * *John Romero's Doom page features a section on MCB's gift to id Software and accompanying mp3 and a scan of the liner Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Scottish rock singers Category:Scottish rock musicians Category:Rock guitarists Category:People from Dunfermline
title: Manny Charlton
